oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Centre Wales Factsheet 9: Introduction to organic certification for farmers and growers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anon,
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
Values, standards and certification
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This factsheet provides an introduction to organic certification for farmers and growers. In order to sell produce as organic, you must be registered with a certification body. The responsibility of the certifying bodies are explained, along with advice on how to choose and a list of certification bodies and contact details is given.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Anon, (2006) Organic Centre Wales Factsheet 9: Introduction to organic certification for farmers and growers. Organic Centre Wales.
